entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is one of the people in the room, described as getting into bed and falling silent.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is another person in the room, gazing fondly at his moonlit cactus.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the people in the room, feeling shaken by an argument with Seamus.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another person in the room, putting his things away.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is a person who had an argument with Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who believed Harry and announced his version of events to the whole school and wider Wizarding community.

entities.name: wizengamot
entities.description: The Wizengamot is an organization that threw Dumbledore from their ranks.

relationships.description: Harry had an argument with Seamus, who suggested Harry was lying or unhinged.
The Wizengamot threw Dumbledore from their ranks.
Dumbledore believed Harry and announced his version of events to the whole school and wider Wizarding community.
The Wizengamot threw Dumbledore from their ranks.
